

    =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

    My favorite thing about you is how much you make me feel
        appreciated and understood.
            As you already know, I am quite different,
                yet you still make
                    me feel like I am the only person in the room.

    -=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

            I do want to be straight-forward for a moment...

                        I want you to understand,


    I am far from having my life figured out, and I will most certainly show
    my uglier side here and there. However, I can promise that I will always
    support and care for you, tell you how beautiful you are, and treat you
    like a Queen. No matter what, I will always want the best for you, even if
    I am annoying the hell out of you - it's because I want you to excel in
                	everything you set your mind to.


    /\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\/\

    ** Whoa! It seems that there is a message inside..
            But apparently the data was converted to binary.

                        ..How will you decode it? **

            -----------      ---------------     --------------
